typeOfAdvertisement.name: Advertisement or hoarding on wall or post or in the form of non-illuminated sky-signs
Advertisement or hording standing blank but bearing the name of the advertiser or with the announcement ‘to be let’ displayed thereon
Digital Advertisement (non-static LED) or similar device single side rates will be double top the traditional and existing fixed illuminated sky-signs
Non-illuminated advertisement boards carried on vehicles (i.e. cabs/auto rickshaw/Pvt. Vehicles etc.) including buses
Illuminated advertisement boards carried on vehicles (i.e. cabs/auto, rickshaw/Pvt. Vehicles etc.) including buses plying Chandigarh
Advertisement boards etc. carried by sandwich boardmen (Non-illuminated)
Illuminated advertisement boards etc. carried by boardmen, handcraft, cyclist or cycle rickshaws
For illuminated sky-signs and advertisement exhibited on screens by mean of lantern slides, projector or similar devices

Permission to auctioneers, temporary/ travelling sales organizer, exhibitor, fair organizers, circuses, convention organizer, etc. to put up not more than two hordes of reasonable size less than 5 sq. ft. advertising each auction or sale other than those on the premises where the auction is held. One on a prominent site in the locality and one on the municipal lamp post.
Advt. exhibited in cinema houses by means of
Banners on buildings or on open space or road side, except main roads
Advt. by Balloons (Measured across the diameter)
Non-illuminated Advt. boards carried on vehicles solely and chiefly for the purpose of Advt. for a space
Illuminated Advt. boards carried out on vehicles solely and chiefly for the purpose of advt. for a space
